con:request.name: testLargePost - Request 1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:bas="http://www.betfair.com/servicetypes/v2/Baseline/"> <soapenv:Header><bas:Header><!--type: <!--Optional:--> <!--type: int--> <bas:size>2</bas:size> <bas:objects> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bas:ComplexObject> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <bas:name>asdf</bas:name>
